name: Drive It (Jhonny6)
description:
Drive It is a 3D game where you are a car and you have to get to the end of the maze using your words.

Gameplay

You are trapped in a world full of mazes, and the only thing you can do to get out of the world is to complete the mazes.

Mechanics

This game is voice-activated. Each word has a function in the game, and this is how you will be able to move the car and use the menu functions.

Members

This is a project I have done with my friend Alejandro Perpiña: Alejandro.itch.io
